Sure! Here's the translated version of the legal disclaimers for your dictionary website:
Legal Disclaimer:

Site Responsibility:

The website of our dictionary is created as part of my web and mobile web developer training. The main objective is to provide a pedagogical learning tool for users to improve their knowledge of foreign languages using the free API provided by https://dictionaryapi.dev/.

Intellectual Property:
All content, including texts, images generated by artificial intelligence, graphics, logos, and other elements present on the website, are the intellectual property of the author, unless otherwise stated. All copyrights, trademarks, service marks, and other intellectual property rights related to the content of the website are reserved.

of the API:

We use the free API provided by https://dictionaryapi.dev/ to provide linguistic information to our users. We acknowledge that the use of this API is subject to its own terms and conditions, which we fully comply with.

Hosting:

The dictionary website will be hosted on GitHub Pages, and as such, it is subject to GitHub's terms of use. We are not responsible for any service interruptions or technical issues related to the hosting platform.

Content Liability:

We strive to provide accurate and up-to-date information on our website. However, we cannot guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or relevance of this information. Therefore, the use of the information provided on this site is at your own risk, and we disclaim any liability for damages or losses resulting from such use.

External Links:

Our site may contain links to external websites over which we have no control. We are not responsible for the content or privacy practices of these external sites. We encourage you to review the privacy policies and legal disclaimers of these sites before using them.

to Legal Disclaimer:

We reserve the right to modify these legal disclaimers at any time and without notice. It is your responsibility to regularly check this page for any updates.
By using our site, you fully agree to these legal disclaimers. If you do not agree with any of these provisions, please discontinue using our website.
Date of the last update of the legal disclaimers: 08/23.
Done at Lure/France, on 08/23.
